articles.title: Trump says he will 'substantially' raise tariffs on India over Russian oil purchases; 'unjustified and unreasonable', says New Delhi
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday (August 4, 2025) once again raised the issue of India buying oil from Russia and profiting from it. He stated that he would be “substantially” raising the tariff “paid by India to the USA”. India hit back, calling the move 'unjustified and unreasonable'.

articles.title: At least four killed, several feared washed away in Uttarkashi cloudburst
articles.description: A cloudburst in Uttarakhand's Uttarkashi district on Tuesday (August 5, 2025) killed at least four people and several others are feared missing. Many houses were swept away by the raging waters, videos shared on social media showed.

articles.title: Texas Democrats who left state prevent vote, for now, on Trump's efforts to add GOP House seats
articles.description: Texas Democrats who left the state to prevent a vote on a redrawn congressional map sought by President Donald Trump have returned, but the immediate threat of losing their quorum has passed for now. The standoff highlights the ongoing political battles shaping the state's representation in Congress.
